amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Fair Housing Activities by $10 million and reduces funding for Information Technology by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Fair Housing Activities by $10 million and to reduce funding for Information Technology by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
